description:
What is up, humans?! Today, we're playing...
Bleach: Brave Souls!

Bleach: Brave Souls, the 3D action game for mobile and PC based on the hit anime series, Bleach, now has a new "Arena" mode!
Enjoy this livestream introducing this new "Arena" mode where you can go up against players from around the world in a real-time battle!

Download Bleach: Brave Souls ▼
https://bbs.onelink.me/kJmc/8f9a9d74

■ Sponsored by Bleach: Brave Souls

-Official Website: https://www.bleach-bravesouls.com/en/
This livestream is made with the permission of KLab Inc.
©Tite Kubo/Shueisha, TV TOKYO, dentsu, Pierrot　©KLabGames
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CHECK OUT MY NEW ALBUM!
https://calliope.streamlink.to/2ndEPCD

Stream me and Rikka-senpai's new original song, Spiral Tones!
https://streamlink.to/spiraltones

✿[Viewer Rules]✿
What is up, humans! Thanks for checkin’ my stream!
If you follow these rules, maybe I wait just a bit longer. :}
(Do it.)

1.Be nice to other viewers. Don’t spam or troll.
2.If you see spam or trolling, don’t respond. Just block, report, and ignore those comments.
3.Talk about the stream, but please don’t bring up unrelated topics or have personal conversations.
4.Don’t bring up other streamers or streams unless I mention them.
5.Similarly, don’t talk about me or my stream in other streamers’ chat.
6.Please refrain from chatting before the stream starts to prevent any issues.
As long as you follow the rules above, you can chat in any language.

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝
